title: The Secret Life of the Homecoming Queen
description: In this Dateline classic, a football player and homecoming queen fall in love, but when the husband is found stabbed to death, authorities begin to investigate a trail of evidence. Dennis Murphy reports. Originally aired on NBC on May 21, 2010.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
